  <title>Mario side</title>
<h1 style="color:Tomato;"><b>Donkey Kong's appearances in Mario</b></h1>
<hr>
<p>Donkey Kong has been in Mario Kart 12 times though that doesn't include the up coming Mario Kart and Donkey is Kong Jr. in Super Mario Kart if you count that.(Info gotten from <a href="https://mariokart.fandom.com/wiki/Donkey_Kong"> Mario Kart fandom Wiki</a>)</p>
<img 
src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="DK Mario Kart 8 art" width="200" height="300">

<p1><br>Donkey appears in every Mario sports game besides Mario's tennis and NES open Golf which have either DK Jr. or Cranky Kong so Donkey Kong is in 26 games though Baseball, Bowser's Lair Hockey, Donkey Kong Hockey, Golf, Golf (Game Boy), Golf: Japan Course, Golf: U.S. Course, Golf*, LEGO Super Mario Goal, any Mario and Sonic Olympic games, Mobile Golf, NBA Street V3, Nintendo PowerFest '94, PolterCue, SSX on Tour, Stroke & Match Golf and Super Mario Spikers weren't counted. (Info gotten from <a href="https://www.mariowiki.com/Category:Sports_gamesg"> Mario Sports Wiki </a>)</p1>
<img src="https://i.pinimg.com/736x/37/2d/9f/372d9f776472ab9e3732fc80183bb493.jpg" alt="DK Mario Sports Mix art" width="200" height="300">

<p2><br>Donkey Kong appears in every Mario party besides Mario Party Advance and Mario Party Island Tour being in 17 games though he has had a weird reputation when it comes to being to playable though starting in Mario party 5 he wasn't playable for the first time hosting the DK spaces only being playable again in Mario Party 10 and has been playable in every other game since then besides Mario Party The Top 100 but he is in the game.(Info gotten from <a href="https://www.mariowiki.com/Mario_Party_(series)"> Mario Wiki</a>)</p2>
<img 
src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTgGwRPku8_nK5mwJTP0CbJm75Yfpmy_iEKPg&s" alt="DK Mario Star Rush art" width="200" height="300">

<p3><br>The Mario Vs Donkey Kong has Donkey Kong in though in Mini Mario & Friends: amiibo Challenge only has mini Donkey so thats 5 games.(Info gotten from <ahref="https://www.mariowiki.com/Mario_vs._Donkey_Kong_(series)"> Mario Wiki</a>)</p3>
<img 
src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRJLi5JPRHv89OlR-UrBoE15L6vpu7wrIRluw&s" alt="DK Mario Vs Donkey Kong art" width="200" height="300">

<p4><br>In Mario+Rabbids Kingdom Battle a tactical RPG there was a Donkey Kong DLC where players use a party of Donkey Kong, Cranky Rabbid and Rabbid Peach to defeat Rabbid Kong the first boss of the main campaign though the DK campaign is completely unrelated to the base game as all that is required to play it is that you've beaten the first world and it has no Mario elements the warp pipes are tree trucks, coins are bananas and cannons are barrel cannons, all weapons are just silly things like phone as a Bwananarang for DK or refences to the animal bubbies from Donkey Kong Country for Rabbid Peach's Sentry and Rabbid Peach and the opening cutscene are the most Mario it gets so this could be on the Donkey Kong side of things if you think so it'll be mentioned for both sides.</p4>
<img 
src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="DK Mario+Rabbids Donkey Kong Adventure art" width="200" height="300">

<p5><br>There was 60 games with Mario games with Donkey Kong in them but there are 3 others with Donkey Kong Jr. or Cranky Kong in them, 1 game not out yet but has DK in it and 1 game that can go either way. This number may seem unbeatable to the Donkey Kong side but a quick reminder that most of theses games have Donkey Kong as an <a style="font-size:25px;">option</a> that you can play as the most needed Donkey Kong is in the Donkey Kong Adventure but that's on the fence if it should be on the Mario side so second to that is Mario vs Donkey Kong and Mario Parties 5-9 where he is either a villain or the a help to the players and not in a playable role.</p5>
<p6><br> Would you like to go home or check the DK side.
